summary: Basically, this is a list of mods for fans of TW series who want to play the same way.
descriptionHtml:
If, like me, you are a fan of TW3, you surely want Skyrim to be a bit more Witcher-like. This list of mods is made for you. From my personnal experience, Witcher Experience mod is buggy as hell. So there we will use a mashup of mods to replace it.

[b][u]FOR UI/HUD:[/u][/b]
Customizable UI Replacer[url=http://] https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82725[/url] -> well, not exactly like in TW, but the best I found.
For the Character Building:
Apachii Skyhair [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168[/url] -> use hair 34 to look like Geralt! (for female character)
TW3 Eyes [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622[/url] -> you always wanted to have those cat-like eyes, don't lie.
[u][b]ARMORS AND WEAPONS:[/b][/u]
Armor Perk Helmet Remover [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12580[/url] -> You never saw Geralt using a helmet, why would you!
Common Clothes [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51813[/url] -> for more diversity and realism in people's outfits
Kaer Morhen Gear: you can take both
WICO for males and NPC improvement [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84898[/url]
Graviczapa's one for female also [url=http://]https://graviczapa.blogspot.fr/2016/06/geralt-of-rivia-kaermohen-gear.html?zx=4eab0461bd669d72[/url]
For Geralt's vest of Witcher 2:
Fluffy Travel Attire, for females [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53518[/url]
Woodland Raven Armor, for males [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73382[/url]
Manticore Gear, alas, male-only [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81151[/url]
Ursine armor, male and female [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77667[/url] -> by the same team than previous one. One of the best-looking armor i ever saw. Like in the game, need to find the schematics to be able to craft it.
Cat Armor, male and female [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78506[/url] -> a mini quest is included to find the schematics. Loved it!
JRC's Witcher Style Sword Pack [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71912[/url] -> add swords to craft, and relics hidden in the world. Aerondight, like in the Witcher, is completely overpowered.
LeanWolf's Better-Shaped Weapons [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39870[/url] for more realistic weapons.
Legendary Skyrim Crossbow [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82171[/url] -> a true Witcher uses a crossbow and no bows.
Witcher's Bandoliers [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72861[/url] -> you need something to carry those fourty and a half inches swords! Works well with Bandolier, bags and pouches ([url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438[/url])
[u][b]GAMEPLAY:[/b][/u]
Equipping Overhaul [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784[/url] -> I use it with a greatsword on back and a one-handed on back. Allows you to vary your gamelplay according to your adversary (one-handed and magic for groups, and two-handed against a monster)
FNIS PCEA2 [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71055[/url] -> you don't want to use the same animations for a fight than bandits, don't you? Not everyone is a witcher. I included my animations mashup
Skyrim Immersive Creatures [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913[/url] -> get tired of Falmers? Try it. I also recommand MihailMods for his awesome work-in-progress ([url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/37834630[/url])
The Sounds of Skyrim Series, by Cliffworms [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/13821?tab=user+files[/url] -> there is no mods for Witcher-senses, but this audio overhaul can patch it.
Unread Books Glow [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10012[/url] -> again, a littel replacement for the lack of Witcher-sense mod.
Ordinator [url=http://]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68425[/url] -> for a more immersive way to get new perks. Choose this or
Witchery skill [url=http://https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67384]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68922[/url] -> adds oils, and actually makes useful since the beginning the alchemy branch prek.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20534]Witcher Ultimate replacer
[/url] -> for the factions armours.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67384]﻿Witcher Music Overhaul
[/url]
I also add a prologue gear (Geralt's shirt, for males and female -CBBE model but works with UNP)
To place my Witcher-fighting animations mashup,, just copy-paste in the FNIS PCEA2 folder

That's pretty much it. Enjoy!
Credits: mofu, cyh045 and yukl for their animations
author: Heorlasgir
